definitions.definition: A wireless telecommunications device that receives text or voice messages .
A computer program running in a text terminal , used to view (but not modify) the contents of a text file moving down the file one line or one screen at a time.
Something (a document , book etc.) that has a specified number of pages .
One who makes up type into pages of a book ; one who binds or sorts pages into a book .

main_definition: ( telecommunications ) A wireless telecommunications device that receives text or voice messages .
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) A computer program running in a text terminal , used to view (but not modify) the contents of a text file moving down the file one line or one screen at a time.
( in combination ) Something (a document , book etc.) that has a specified number of pages .
( bookbinding ) One who makes up type into pages of a book ; one who binds or sorts pages into a book .
